verses.verse: Take heed <S%G4337><s%> that ye do <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> to be seen <S%G2300><s%> of them: <S%G846><s%> otherwise <S%G1490><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when thou <S%G4675><s%> doest <S%G4160><s%> alms, <S%G1654><s%> let not <S%G3361><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> left hand <S%G710><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> doeth: <S%G4160><s%>

That <S%G3704><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret: <S%G2927><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which seeth <S%G991><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret <S%G2927><s%> himself <S%G848><s%> shall reward <S%G591><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> openly. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5318><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> thou prayest, <S%G4336><s%> thou shalt not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> are: for <S%G3754><s%> they love <S%G5368><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> streets, <S%G4113><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> they may be seen <S%G5316><s%> <S%G302><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> They have <S%G568><s%> their <S%G848><s%> reward. <S%G3408><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when ye pray, <S%G4336><s%> use not vain repetitions, <S%G945><s%> <S%G3361><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heathen <S%G1482><s%> do: for <S%G1063><s%> they think <S%G1380><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they shall be heard <S%G1522><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G848><s%> much speaking. <S%G4180><s%>

Give <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> daily <S%G1967><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> debts, <S%G3783><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> debtors. <S%G3781><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> lead <S%G1533><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation, <S%G3986><s%> but <S%G235><s%> deliver <S%G4506><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> evil: <S%G4190><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye forgive <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> men <S%G444><s%> their <S%G846><s%> trespasses, <S%G3900><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye fast, <S%G3522><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> of a sad countenance: <S%G4659><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they disfigure <S%G853><s%> their <S%G848><s%> faces, <S%G4383><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> they may appear <S%G5316><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%> to fast. <S%G3522><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> They have <S%G568><s%> their <S%G848><s%> reward. <S%G3408><s%>

No man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> masters: <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> either <S%G2228><s%> he will hate <S%G3404><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other; <S%G2087><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> else he will hold <S%G472><s%> to the one, <S%G1520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other. <S%G2087><s%> Ye cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mammon. <S%G3126><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Which <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> by taking thought <S%G3309><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> add <S%G4369><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> cubit <S%G4083><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G848><s%> stature? <S%G2244><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> take ye thought <S%G3309><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> raiment? <S%G1742><s%> Consider <S%G2648><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lilies <S%G2918><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> field, <S%G68><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they grow; <S%G837><s%> they toil <S%G2872><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> do they spin: <S%G3514><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> yet I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G3761><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G848><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> was not arrayed <S%G4016><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these. <S%G5130><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> take no thought, <S%G3309><s%> <S%G3361><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall we eat? <S%G5315><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall we drink? <S%G4095><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> Wherewithal <S%G5101><s%> shall we be clothed? <S%G4016><s%>
